parameters.content:
## üìß HR Email Automation Workflow

### üöÄ Quick Setup (5 Steps)

**STEP 1: Connect Accounts**
- Gmail OAuth2 ‚Üí For sending emails
- Google Sheets OAuth2 ‚Üí For contacts & tracking

**STEP 2: Prepare Google Sheets**

**Sheet 1 - HR Contacts** (Required columns):
- Name
- Email
- Company
- Title

**Sheet 2 - Email Tracking Log** (Leave empty, auto-populated)

**STEP 3: Configure Nodes with ‚ö†Ô∏è UPDATE tags**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Rate Limiter** ‚Üí Change `RAMP_START` date to today

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Email Creator** ‚Üí Replace all `[PLACEHOLDERS]` with your info:
   - [YOUR NAME]
   - [YOUR_EMAIL]
   - [YOUR_PORTFOLIO]
   - [YOUR_LINKEDIN]
   - Update achievements & skills

3Ô∏è‚É£ **Download Resume** ‚Üí Add your Google Drive resume link
   - Right-click resume ‚Üí Share ‚Üí "Anyone with link"
   - Use format: `https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=FILE_ID`

4Ô∏è‚É£ **Google Sheets - Read HR Data** ‚Üí Connect Sheet 1

5Ô∏è‚É£ **Log to Google Sheets** ‚Üí Connect Sheet 2

6Ô∏è‚É£ **Schedule Trigger** ‚Üí Set daily send time (default: 10:30 AM)

**STEP 4: Test Run**
- Create test sheet with 2-3 contacts
- Run workflow manually
- Verify: email sent + resume attached + logged

**STEP 5: Activate**
- Switch to real contact sheet
- Toggle workflow ON
- Check logs daily first week

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

**Daily Process:**
1. Reads contacts from Google Sheet
2. Removes duplicates
3. Validates email formats
4. Filters generic emails (info@, support@, etc.)
5. Applies rate limiting (gradual ramp-up)
6. Creates personalized emails
7. Sends with 3-min delays
8. Logs all attempts

**Rate Limiting Schedule:**
- Week 1: 20 emails/day
- Week 2: 50 emails/day
- Week 3: 100 emails/day
- Week 4+: 150 emails/day

**Safety Features:**
- 3-minute delay between emails
- Generic email filtering
- Duplicate prevention
- Failed send tracking
- Gmail rate limit compliance

---

### üí° Pro Tips

‚úÖ Test with dummy emails first
‚úÖ Keep HR sheet updated
‚úÖ Monitor tracking sheet daily
‚úÖ Adjust rate limits if needed
‚úÖ A/B test subject lines

‚ùå Don't send to personal contacts without permission
‚ùå Don't exceed Gmail's 500/day limit
‚ùå Don't use for spam
